snippet: Radek Stepanek and Dustin Brown have been granted wild cards into the main draw at Wimbledon....
lead_paragraph: Radek Stepanek and Dustin Brown have been granted wild cards into the main draw at Wimbledon.

headline.print_headline: Stepanek, Brown Get Wild Cards Into Main Wimbledon Draw
